    <td rowspan="9" width="230" valign="middle" height="30" align="center"><img src="teacherpic/张海涛.jpg" style="display:block; max-width:230px; max-height:460px; width:auto; height:auto;"></td>

  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">研究方向</td>
    <td style="height: 30px">&nbsp;大数据分析与管理，云计算，多媒体信息处理</td>
  </tr>
   <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">个人介绍</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;张海涛，男，博士，北京邮电大学计算机学院副教授。2012年在北京邮电大学获博士学位，曾在美国IIT进行访问研究。主要研究方向为大数据分析与管理、云计算、多媒体信息处理。主持和参与多项国家自然科学基金、国家973项目、国家863项目和企业研发项目。在大数据、云计算和网络多媒体系统等方面取得一系列创新性成果，在IEEE&nbsp;Transactions、IEEE&nbsp;INFOCOM、IEEE&nbsp;Bigdata、IEEE&nbsp;Cloud等国际国内权威刊物和会议上发表论文10余篇，负责和参与制定多项ITU（国际电信联盟）标准。曾担任多个国际学术会议和刊物的论文评阅人。</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">承担课题</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;主持：<br>国家自然科学基金青年项目“物联网环境下视频大数据处理平台设计理论与关键技术研究”；<br>教育部博士点学科专项科研基金课题“面向物联网视频数据中心的大数据分布式计算理论研究”；<br>国家863计划项目子课题“基于深度学习的大数据语义分析技术”（合作）；<br>参与：<br>国家重点基础研究发展计划（973计划）项目“物联网体系结构基础研究”；<br>国家自然科学基金杰出青年项目“网络环境中多媒体计算”；<br>工信部物联网发展专项资金项目“基于视频大数据处理平台的城市公共智能安防系统的研究与应用示范&nbsp;”；<br>北京市教委共建项目“视频数据中心关键技术研究”。<br></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">获奖和成果</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">&nbsp;2012年度中国人工智能学会优秀博士学位论文提名奖。</td>
  </tr>
   <tr>
    <td style="height: 30px" align="center">
        发表论文</td>
    <td colspan="2" style="height: 30px">代表性论文：<br>[1]&nbsp;Haitao&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Xiangyang&nbsp;Li,&nbsp;Shaojie&nbsp;Tang,&nbsp;“In-Network&nbsp;Estimation&nbsp;with&nbsp;Delay&nbsp;Constraints&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks”,&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;Transactions&nbsp;on&nbsp;Parallel&nbsp;and&nbsp;Distributed&nbsp;Systems&nbsp;(IEEE&nbsp;TPDS),&nbsp;Vol.&nbsp;24,&nbsp;No.&nbsp;2,&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;368-380,&nbsp;Feb.&nbsp;2013.<br>[2]&nbsp;Haitao&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Shaojie&nbsp;Tang,&nbsp;Xiangyang&nbsp;Li,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“Tracking&nbsp;and&nbsp;Identifying&nbsp;Burglar&nbsp;using&nbsp;Collaborative&nbsp;Sensor-Camera&nbsp;Networks”,&nbsp;the&nbsp;31st&nbsp;Annual&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Computer&nbsp;Communications-Mini&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;(IEEE&nbsp;INFOCOM&nbsp;2012),&nbsp;Mar.&nbsp;2012,&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;2596-2600.<br>[3]&nbsp;Haitao&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Xiang-Yang&nbsp;Li,&nbsp;Shaojie&nbsp;Tang,&nbsp;Xiaohua&nbsp;Xu,&nbsp;“Energy-Efficient&nbsp;Scheduling&nbsp;with&nbsp;Delay&nbsp;Constraints&nbsp;for&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks:&nbsp;A&nbsp;Calculus-Based&nbsp;Perspective”,&nbsp;Computer&nbsp;Communications,&nbsp;vol.&nbsp;35,&nbsp;no.&nbsp;16,&nbsp;Sep.&nbsp;2012,&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;1983-1993.<br>[4]&nbsp;Haitao&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Xiangyang&nbsp;Li,&nbsp;“Estimate&nbsp;Aggregation&nbsp;with&nbsp;Delay&nbsp;Constraints&nbsp;in&nbsp;Multihop&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks”,&nbsp;ACM/IEEE&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Cyber-Physical&nbsp;Systems&nbsp;(ACM/IEEE&nbsp;ICCPS&nbsp;2011),&nbsp;Apr.&nbsp;2011,&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;184-193.<br>[5]&nbsp;Haitao&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;“In-Network&nbsp;Puncturing&nbsp;for&nbsp;Delay-Efficient&nbsp;Rate&nbsp;Control&nbsp;of&nbsp;Distributed&nbsp;Video&nbsp;Coding&nbsp;in&nbsp;Wireless&nbsp;Video&nbsp;Sensor&nbsp;Networks”,&nbsp;China&nbsp;Communications,&nbsp;Vol.&nbsp;9,&nbsp;no.&nbsp;6,&nbsp;2012,&nbsp;pp.&nbsp;45-54.&nbsp;<br>[6]&nbsp;Xiaomeng&nbsp;Zhao,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Haitao&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Yi&nbsp;Tang,&nbsp;Guangping&nbsp;Fu,&nbsp;“Metadata&nbsp;Extraction&nbsp;and&nbsp;Correction&nbsp;for&nbsp;Large-Scale&nbsp;Traffic&nbsp;Surveillance&nbsp;Videos”,&nbsp;The&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Big&nbsp;Data&nbsp;2014&nbsp;(IEEE&nbsp;BigData&nbsp;2014),&nbsp;2014.<br>[7]&nbsp;Xiaomeng&nbsp;Zhao,&nbsp;Huadong&nbsp;Ma,&nbsp;Haitao&nbsp;Zhang,&nbsp;Yi&nbsp;Tang,&nbsp;Yue&nbsp;Kou,&nbsp;“HVPI:&nbsp;Extending&nbsp;Hadoop&nbsp;to&nbsp;Support&nbsp;Video&nbsp;Analytic&nbsp;Applications”,&nbsp;IEEE&nbsp;8th&nbsp;International&nbsp;Conference&nbsp;on&nbsp;Cloud&nbsp;Computing&nbsp;(IEEE&nbsp;Cloud&nbsp;2015).<br></td>
